recipesJson.name: love peach dumplings
recipesJson.author: Benoz
recipesJson.description: The vta love makes this recipe. i got the love and the croissant in at the same time and thought i would chuck them together what i got was unexpected a deli shes white choc peach bakery. This is one of a couple of juices i made that is moreish and sooo good most of my juices i usually rate around the 3 to 4 star mark my self but this one is a 5 for sure imo.
